caption.p: ( a) Monosaccharide composition (in weight %) of the parent and fractionated pectin samples; ( b) monosaccharide content of the pectin fractions related to the parent pectin fraction (%P0). NOTE: GlcA (glucuronic acid), GalA (galacturonic acid), Xyl (xylose), Man (mannose), Glc (glucose), Gal (galactose), Rha (rhamnose), Ara (arabinose).
